title: Strong Correlation of PROMIS Upper Extremity and Shoulder Arthroplasty Smart Score to ...

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: PROMIS UE showed excellent correlation with ASES at 6-month (r =0.647) and minimum 2-year follow-up (r =0.761).
**TACTICAL WIN [SHIP NOW]**: Incorporate automated prompts to improve patient compliance and data quality.
**MARKET SIGNAL [ðŸ”´ URGENT]**: Growing regulatory pressure for PRO integration in clinical trials.
**CONCERN**: Study limited by short follow-up; long-term efficacy remains unassessed.
